quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.
Think before you speak. Read before you think.
The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
Reading furnishes the mind only with materials of knowledge; it is thinking that makes what we read ours.
The mind is what it thinks. To make it true, think true.
No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking.
Reading without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
Never be afraid to sit awhile and think.
You and I are not what we eat; we are what we think.
An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
We don t see things as they are, we see them as we are.
No matter what the situation, remind yourself ?I have a choice.
A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices.
Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
Few minds wear out; more rust out.
It is well for people who think, to change their minds occasionally in order to keep them clean.
Most of the mistakes in thinking are inadequacies of perception rather than mistakes of logic.
A man who does not think for himself does not think at all.
Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
Thinking is easy, acting is difficult, and to put one's thoughts into action is the most difficult thing in the world.
Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too
Thinking is the greatest torture in the world for most people.
